ai-mil7.3.9:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what definitely did you say?”
ai-mil7.3.9:1.2_0: “Great king, I thought: ‘I am doing this work, I can’t do whatever deed is required. I don’t get done, they shouldn’t be done for the sake of diligence.’
ai-mil7.3.9:1.3_0: In the same way, anyone who thinks: ‘Great king, thought thus: ‘I am made up of the four primary elements, produced by mother and father, built up from rice and porridge, liable to sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.’
ai-mil7.3.9:1.5_0: The senior monk who has heard the statement of the Teacher:
ai-mil7.3.9:3.1_0: The ninth enquiry is a ninth thing.
